entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Inukjuak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:11 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 31.
